email_body: This was sent to me from my friend who works at the Home Depot corporate office.> > >>The stupidity of some people in this world never fails to amaze me. > >> > >> This picture is real - not doctored in anyway - and was taken last week > >>in > >> Waldorf, MD by a Transportation Supervisor for a company that delivers > >> building materials for 84 Lumber. When he saw it there in the parking > >>lot > >> of IHOP, he went and bought a camera to take pictures. > >> > >> The car is still running as can be witnessed by the exhaust. A woman is > >> either asleep or otherwise out in the front seat passenger side. The > >>guy > >> driving it was over jogging up and down on Rt. 925 in the background. > >>The > >> witnesses said their physical state was OTHER than normal and the police > >> just shook their heads in amazement. The driver finally came back after > >> the police were there and was getting down at the back to cut the 'twine > >> around the load. They told him to get back until it was taken off. > >> > >> The materials were loaded at Home Depot. Their store manager said they > >> had the customer sign a waiver! > >> > >> Both back tires are trashed. The back shocks were driven up through > >>the > >> floorboard. In the back seat are 10 bags, 80 lbs. each of concrete. > >> On the roof is many 2X4s, 4X4s and OSB sheets of lumber. They estimated > >>the > >> load weight at 3000 lbs. The car is a VW Jetta with FL plates and the > >>guy > >> said he was headed for Annapolis. > >> > >>JUST UNBELIEVABLE!!!! > >> > - stupid.jpg
